item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Alex Baker

I’m an IT specialist, infrastructure technician, and lifelong computer tinkerer.

alexbakertech is my personal project space — a place to document, share, and refine the tools and practices I use in my day-to-day technical life. It serves as both a portfolio and a playground.

Areas of focus

  • 🔧 Infrastructure as Code (Ansible, Terraform)
  • 🔐 Security-conscious automation
  • 🏠 Homelab design & network resilience
  • ☁️ Cloud-native workflows & observability
  • 🛠️ Documentation-first engineering

I value simplicity, transparency, and pragmatic engineering — building things that work and last.

item.title: Architecture
item.description:
Network Layout

The lab is segmented into management, services, and guest networks using VLANs and static routes.

Components

  • pfSense
  • Proxmox
  • Managed switch
  • Dedicated firewall VM

Goals

  • Reduce attack surface
  • Isolate workloads
  • Enable controlled remote access

item.title: Automation
item.description:
Tools Used

  • Ansible for provisioning
  • Terraform for future expansion
  • Cron jobs for self-healing tasks

Example Tasks

  • Auto-updates
  • Daily snapshot backups
  • Configuration drift detection
